title: Police confront armed masked men in unregistered bikes at parliament protest
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police confronted 6 armed men dressed in military attire on off-road motorbikes during a protest opposite the Parliament premises on Tuesday (5).
These three motorbikes reportedly arrived from the direction of the parliament and did not have any registration number on them.
Police officers were seen confronting them and questioning them, and even taking the keys off the bikes.
